highlights.headline: Cydney Sanders crushes her 2nd HR of game for Oklahoma
highlights.description: Cydney Sanders pummels her second home run in as many at-bats to give Oklahoma a 4-1 lead over Oregon.

highlights.headline: Laura Mealer's walk-off single lifts Lady Vols in extras
highlights.description: Laura Mealer delivers in extra innings with a walk-off hit to give Tennessee a 5-4 win over UCLA.
